data.name: AWAY: The Survival Series
data.detailed_description:
A STORM IS COMING...


Set in a distant future, a series of natural disasters threatens the survival of every species on the planet. As you venture deeper into the wilderness, will you have what it takes to survive?

Welcome to AWAY: The Survival Series, a nature documentary-inspired adventure game where you play as the last remaining animals on Earth.

A new twist on the adventure genre, each episode of AWAY takes you on a new animal's journey across a rapidly decaying planet. From the Sugar Glider to the Bearded Vulture, experience nature's ultimate fight for survival through the eyes of the beast.

EPISODE 1


Embark on the Sugar Glider's adventures in the first episode of AWAY. Sitting near the bottom of the food chain, this nimble marsupial makes up for its small size with superior agility as you jump, climb, and glide through your surroundings.

  • EXPLORE THE WORLD
    From mighty treetops to the forest floor, immerse yourself in nature and uncover mysterious artifacts as you explore the breathtaking world around you.

  • FIGHT FOR SURVIVAL
    Hunt your prey and fend off vicious predators as you encounter animals of all shapes and sizes in the perilous lands of AWAY.

  • ENCHANTING SOUNDTRACK
    Having worked on countless major soundtracks, ranging from games like Resident Evil, Call of Duty, and Destiny to movies such as Mad Max, Transformers, and Planet Earth II, Mike Raznick brings his experience as a multi-award winning composer and audio director to the AWAY series with an enchanting orchestral soundtrack.

ABOUT BREAKING WALLS

Breaking Walls is an independent gaming studio based in Montréal, Canada. With decades of experience in the industry working on AAA titles such as Assassin's Creed, Far Cry, and Rainbow Six, our team has spent the last two years building AWAY.


info(at)breakingwalls(dot)co
https://breakingwalls.co/
https://www.awayseries.com/

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

https://www.reddit.com/r/AwayGame
https://www.facebook.com/AwaySeries
https://www.twitter.com/AwaySeries

data.short_description: AWAY: The Survival Series is a 3rd-person adventure game where you play as the last remaining animals on Earth. Set in a post-apocalyptic future, embark on a breathtaking journey across a decaying planet as you experience nature's ultimate fight for survival through the eyes of the beast.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These values are only estimates, as we cannot predict exact specifications at this stage.
